All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AircraftCarrier
AircraftCarrier: a ship occupying four cells (size = 4).
Board
Implementation of the IBoard interface using a HashMap-based grid system.
BoardAdapter
Abstract adapter class for IBoard that provides default implementations of all interface methods by delegating to a wrapped Board instance.
Coordinates
Helper utility to generate and shuffle board coordinates.
Destroyer
Destroyer: a ship occupying two cells (size = 2).
Frigate
Frigate: a ship occupying a single cell (size = 1).
Game
Main controller of the Battleship game.
Game.GameState
Represents the possible states of the game.
Game.ShotResult
Represents the result of a shot.
GameAdapter
 
GameController
Controller class for the main game view in the Battleship application.
GameController.BoardRenderer
Utility class for rendering board tiles.
GameLoadException
 
GameSaveException
 
GameState
Represents a serializable snapshot of the game state.
GameView
Singleton view responsible for loading and displaying the game window.
Human
Human player implementation.
IBoard
Represents the interface for a game board in battleship Provides methods to modify and retrieve values from board cells
IGame
Defines the core behaviors required for any Battleship game implementation.
InvalidGameStateException
 
InvalidPositionException
 
InvalidShotException
 
IPlaneTextFileHandler
Defines a contract for plain text file input and output operations.
IPlayer
Player interface used by Human and Machine implementations.
ISerializableFileHandler
Defines a contract for file-based object serialization and deserialization.
IShip
Interface describing a ship placed on the board.
IShip.Direction
Cardinal directions used for ship placement and iteration.
Machine
Simple machine (CPU) player implementation.

MainMenuController
Controller for the main menu view.
MainMenuView
View responsible for displaying the main menu window.
PlaneTextFileHandler
Handles plain text file reading and writing operations.
PlayerAdapter
Abstract adapter class for IPlayer that provides default implementations of all interface methods by delegating to a wrapped IPlayer instance.
PlayerData
Represents player statistics and data persistence for the Battleship game.
SerializableFileHandler
Handles object serialization and deserialization for game state persistence.
ShipAdapter
Abstract adapter class for IShip that provides default implementations of all interface methods by delegating to a wrapped IShip instance.
SmartAI
Advanced Artificial Intelligence for the Battleship game.
SpriteSheet
Utility class to slice a sprite sheet image into smaller sprite segments and optionally rotate them for vertical orientation.
StatsController
Controller for the game statistics screen.
StatsView
View for displaying game statistics after a match concludes.
Submarine
Submarine: a ship occupying three cells (size = 3).
VictoryController
Controller for the victory/defeat screen.
VictoryView
View displayed when the game ends (victory or defeat).
